to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards
US Food and Drug Administration authority (FDA)
pinyin: shi2 wu4 ji2 yao4 pin3 guan3 li3 ju2

sentences.english: Efficient quality control should significantly reduce the amount of merchandise that is taken back for refund.
sentences.chinese: 有效的品管应该可以显著地减少要求退钱的商品数量。

sentences.english: We overthrow the old qc group, because they are out of date.
sentences.chinese: 我们推翻了老旧的品管组织，因为他们已经过时了。

sentences.english: Work closely with quality team to analyze and solve quality problems.
sentences.chinese: 同品管团队密切配合，一起分析并解决品质问题。

sentences.english: And we think that your factory needs to take measures to improve quality control.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为你们工厂需要采取措施来改善品管。

sentences.english: Insured's QC report to verify whether the product in question is defective.
sentences.chinese: 被保险人之品管报告以厘清此产品是否有瑕疵。

sentences.english: IV. Full quality control, a hill no bad products.
sentences.chinese: 全员品管，创山山产品无不良。

sentences.english: Trict quality control and friendly aftersales service are our commitments to customer .
sentences.chinese: 严格的品管控制与亲切的销受服务为我们的承诺。

sentences.english: Direct QC to monitor process during every build.
sentences.chinese: 指导品管在每次坐蓐时监督流程。

sentences.english: Teach the agents and quality control of microbial inoculants.
sentences.chinese: 接种剂商品化之程度与品管。

sentences.english: All of the label shall give clear indication and put the QA permission seal on the label.
sentences.chinese: 所有标签注明相关内容并盖品管允收章。

sentences.english: I was quality management in the company.
sentences.chinese: 我以前是这家公司的品管。

sentences.english: Experience matters — remember I said that the person claimed to be a QC guy?
sentences.chinese: 经验关系，记得我说过，那个申请人自称是‘品管’？

sentences.english: Quality-control officers are required to inspect each article of clothing for imperfections.
sentences.chinese: 品管人员被要求检查每件衣服是否由瑕疵。

sentences.english: Department and the smooth running of the laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 负责品管部的日常运行及实验室的顺利运转。

sentences.english: Quality management department verify execution status and effectiveness of improving measures.
sentences.chinese: 品管部验证改善措施的执行情况和执行有效性。

definition: quality control (QC), abbr. for 品質控制|品质控制
biotechnology/abbr. for 生物技術|生物技术/(Tw) abbr. for 生物科技
